notes: Setting up [Apache Spark](https://spark.apache.org/) on Amazon SageMaker & EMR. Analyze datasets using Spark [Resilient Distributed Datasets (RDD)](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/rdd-programming-guide.html).

title: [Ray](https://www.ray.io/), [RAPIDS](https://rapids.ai/) & [DuckDB](https://duckdb.org/)
